name: Catholic Apologetica
description: Have you ever stopped to think because there are so many Churches in the world? Or are they simply constantly questioning you and you do not know how to respond? If this has happened to you and much more then well this Catholic apologetic app brings you the answer to all those questions and questions. remember if you call yourself a Catholic you must know your raises, this is the fundamental basis of a true Catholic If you want to know more your faith, if and only if you must download this application completely free to educate yourself and build your life  Here you will find topics about:  THE APPARITIONS OF THE VIRGIN MARY A STUDY ON THE APOCALYPSE, THE TRUE REVELATION THE SOUL AND ETERNITY IS THE HOLY SPIRIT CHOSEN TO THE POPE OR NOT? THE BAPTISM THE BIBLE OR THE CHURCH? 150 REASONS WHY I AM CATHOLIC  these are some of the 20 items and more relevant topics will be posted ...
